meanings.definition: A small round mark or spot
meanings.sent1: She placed a red dot on the map to mark the location of the treasure.
meanings.sent2: The teacher used a green dot to highlight the correct answers.
meanings.sent3: The dot on the ladybug's back made it look like a tiny superhero.
meanings.sent4: The stars in the night sky formed a beautiful dot-to-dot picture.
meanings.sent5: The dot on the dice determined the player's next move.

meanings.definition: A punctuation mark (.) used to separate parts of a sentence or to indicate decimal fractions
meanings.sent1: At the end of the sentence, don't forget to add a dot.
meanings.sent2: She used a dot to separate the whole number from the decimal part.
meanings.sent3: The dot in the sentence was feeling a bit lonely among the words.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes widened as she realized the dot held the key to the code.
meanings.sent5: The dot at the end of the sentence signaled a pause in the story.

meanings.definition: To mark with a small round spot or mark
meanings.sent1: He carefully dotted the 'i' in his name with a heart.
meanings.sent2: She decided to dot her painting with colorful flowers.
meanings.sent3: The artist playfully dotted paint on the canvas, creating a unique pattern.
meanings.sent4: The rain began to dot the ground with tiny puddles.
meanings.sent5: She used a brush to dot the paper with bright splashes of color.
